para.text: This function aim to check the under-voltage latch value of protection.
In the under-voltage latch test, if the voltage value greater than the setting of the protection relay, the relay will not latch and permitted for action.

The process of this test is that when the test is started, the protection is in the permitted action status, and then the voltage value is adjusted to less than the under-voltage latch value, while the protection is in the latched status, the action is not allowed, at this time, the currently voltage value is recorded.

para.text: Defined all the analog outputs magnitudes and phase angles. make the protection relay work properly.

para.text: Duration of prefault state, using the output config with start frequency value.

para.text: An stable state after the variable slipped if no tripping met.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Defined the initial frequency on each steps start. Usually is set to Fnom.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Defined the slip from the start frequency to the stop frequency. Usually this value should less than the df/dt latch value of protection relay.
Defined the testing under-voltage start value. This value have to make the protection relay not in trip status.
Defined the testing under-voltage destination value. This value have to make the protection relay into the trip status.
Defined the ramping step voltage from start to destination under-voltage. Reduce this value can increase the accuracy of test result.
